name: Bricking It (C64)
description:
Bricking It for the Commodore 64 is my terrible tribute to the awful game 'Smash The Windows' that can be found lurking in the deep, dark recesses of Cascade Cassette 50!

This download is a free d64 file that can be run on a C64 emulator such as WinVice.

WARNING! - This game is awful and intentionally so!
